examples.example: 我非常愿意帮助那些需要帮助的人。

translate.english: I am very willing to help those people who need help.

examples.example: 只要你愿意努力，就一定会取得好成绩。

translate.english: As long as you are willing to work hard, you will definitely achieve good results.

examples.example: 他总是很愿意分享自己的快乐给周围的人。

translate.english: He is always willing to share his happiness with the people around him.
